brainly_data.question: Juan needs to prepare his​ résumé. he needs to stress individual areas of competence rather than job history. which type of​ résumé should he​ prepare?
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

all_answers.question: Juan needs to prepare his​ résumé. he needs to stress individual areas of competence rather than job history. which type of​ résumé should he​ prepare?
all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text:
The answer is "functional resume".

A functional resume centers around your abilities and experience, instead of on your ordered work history. It is normally utilized by work searchers who are evolving vocations, who have holes in their business history, or whose work history isn't straightforwardly identified with the activity.
